title: Oppo is testing 240W wired fast charging, because why not
content:
Fast charging has come a long way in just a few short years. It wasn’t too long ago that 45W wired charging in a smartphone seemed impressive, and now some phones (like the iQOO 9 Pro) are reaching 120W charging or higher. Oppo announced on Monday that it is now testing 240W charging, though it’s

The post Oppo is testing 240W wired fast charging, because why not appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Oppo revealed at Mobile World Congress in Barcelona that it is testing 240W charging technology for smartphones.
